--- In gladiator@y..., amyvan133@a... wrote:
> A team is much better because you have more a more rounded group 
with different abilites.

That's part of the reason I like teams better.  The other part is by 
the numbers.  Even superman has trouble taking on lots of opponents at 
once.  With faeries around, you did need additional team members 
besides an archmage.  

In fact, I have designed two scenarios where a single character is at 
a disadvantage:  "Weakest Link" and "Weakest Link 2".
